pros: Clean hospital, great people, very enjoyable experience.
cons: I experienced nothing negative while working here.

job_title: Internal Auditor in El Paso, TX
pros: Ok but could be a better place
cons: Ugly because of COVID-19 it so

pros:
Healthcare benefits and that’s about it
Most of the people are cool
cons: If you're not liked by the right person then forget it you are out. They talk a big game but the decision makers have no backbone. They allow one specific department manager to run the entire hospital. Most of the employees say they can't complain to hr about things like their manager telling them they can't go to hr for anything. Even the hr department has stated they have been told that but they don't do anything about it.

pros: Great benefits,raffles, employee appreciation, polite and supportive HR
cons: Remote location, lack of upgrades in software and equipment, late with adapting to changes with healthcare practices, lack of compassion, expertise, ethics observed from physicians and PAs, overstaffing unskilled positions, redundant "special" positions
